$WmMPID_舞踏イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Dance19,Face|The stage is set.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラインハルト,ch07_01_Reinhardt_M_Dance19,Face|Then we shall give them a show.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ネフェニー,ch09_07_Nepenee_F_Dance19,Face|I will...do what I can.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ベルクト,ch10_14_Berkut_M_Dance19,Face|They will recognize our greatness.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏リネア,ch10_19_Linnea_F_Dance19,Face|I look forward to joining you on the
dance floor, my Lord Berkut...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|♪Hmm-hmm-hm-mmm-mm...
Heroes bringing us hope's light...♪$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You're...still singing? Well, the mission
is complete, so let's head back.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|All right! ...But the ballroom dancing
is so beautiful, don't you think?$k$pI'd love to dance on a lovely stage
like that one day too!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|In that case, Sharena, I've got some
good news for you!$k$pI'm hosting a dance class, and I have
a few spots left for hopeful dancers
such as yourself!$k$pAnd as a bonus, I'll even throw in
a few sessions of singing lessons too!
All taught by yours truly!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow! I'm going to study hard
so I can achieve my dreams of
performing on a stage!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|And that's not all—registration is...
FREE if you share this coupon with
your friends!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I see... Well, if that's your dream,
Sharena, I support you. As does
$Nu, I'm sure.$k$pNow...do either of you know anyone
who might be interested in discount
dancing lessons?$k$p$Sbs150|
